transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another, on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

setMinter.description: Sets the address allowed to mint new tokens.

mintInflation.description: Mints new tokens based on inflation parameters.

mintOnce.description: Mints new tokens for specified holders in one go.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

currentPeriodEnd.description: Returns the end time of the current inflation period.

currentPeriodSupplyCap.description: Returns the supply cap for the current period.

inflationCapPeriod.description: Returns the period for inflation cap.

inflationUnlockTime.description: Returns the unlock time for inflation.

initialMintDone.description: Returns whether the initial mint has been completed.

minter.description: Returns the address allowed to mint new tokens.

owner.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner.

INITIAL_SUPPLY_CAP.description: Returns the initial supply cap value.
